title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 586.4 - Certain agency and local actions exempt
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 586.4 - Certain agency and local actions exempt

State Regulations

An environmental impact statement is not required for
review and action upon class A regional projects or class B regional projects
by the agency or by local governments acting pursuant to an agency-approved
local land use program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
586.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
